summary: The move came as Robinhood shares dropped roughly 8% on Tuesday after the platform said its crypto revenues fell below expectations.
title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Scoops Up 2.2M Falling Robinhood Shares
content: Cathie Wood’s ARK Investment Management picked up a large number of Robinhood (NASDAQ: HOOD) shares on Wednesday, despite the stock platform’s earnings report showing poor crypto revenue.
Read more: Cathie Wood’s Ark, 21Shares Team Up on Bitcoin Futures ETF Application to SEC
